original_text: And I will punish him and his offspring and his servants for their iniquity. I will bring upon them and upon the inhabitants of Jerusalem and upon the people of Judah all the disaster that I have pronounced against them, but they would not hear.’”
korean_text: 또 내가 그와 그의 자손과 신하들을 그들의 죄악으로 말미암아 벌할 것이라 내가 일찍이 그들과 예루살렘 주민과 유다 사람에게 그 모든 재난을 내리리라 선포하였으나 그들이 듣지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: And I will punish him and his offspring and his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그와 그의 자손과 그의 종들을 벌하리라

sentences.original_text: and upon the inhabitants of Jerusalem
and upon the people of Judah
all the disaster that I have pronounced against them
